name: Vasco Shot
text: Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

effect.text: After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'SPECIAL' in the top right corner, which may indicate it's a promotional or special edition card. The rarity is printed as 'R' in the bottom right corner.
